HomePage.title: Discover Israel
HomePage.subtitle: Discover Israel through the people who live it – authentic, story-driven, safe travel with local veterans & diverse communities
HomePage.personalStoriesDesc: Every journey begins with a story. Meet the people who will guide you through Israel's hidden treasures.
HomePage.veteranStoriesDesc: Connect with local veterans who share their authentic stories and experiences of resilience and hope
HomePage.safeJourneysDesc: Comprehensive safety measures and support for worry-free exploration in postwar Israel

sarah.name: Sarah from Jerusalem
sarah.story: After serving in the IDF, Sarah dedicated her life to uncovering Israel's ancient stories. She brings history to life with personal experiences and archaeological discoveries.

ahmed.name: Ahmed from Haifa
ahmed.story: Ahmed works to connect different communities in Haifa. His tours showcase the beautiful diversity of Israeli society and the power of coexistence.

rachel.name: Rachel from Tel Aviv
rachel.story: Rachel uses art and storytelling to show the hidden gems of Tel Aviv. Her tours reveal the creative spirit that defines modern Israel.

story.content: Meet David, a former IDF soldier who now shares his experiences through guided tours. His journey from military service to becoming a bridge between cultures exemplifies the resilience and hope that defines modern Israel.
story.author: David Cohen, Veteran Guide

TrustSafety.title: Trust & Safety
TrustSafety.subtitle: Your safety and security are our top priorities. Explore Israel with confidence through our comprehensive safety measures and veteran-guided experiences.
TrustSafety.commitmentDesc: We maintain the highest standards of trust and safety throughout your Israeli experience, with veteran guides and comprehensive support systems.
TrustSafety.veteranGuidesDesc: All guides are thoroughly vetted veterans with extensive local knowledge and security training
TrustSafety.realTimeMonitoringDesc: 24/7 safety monitoring and instant emergency response support throughout your journey
TrustSafety.emergencySupportDesc: Comprehensive emergency support with direct access to local authorities and medical services
TrustSafety.securePaymentsDesc: Bank-level security with encrypted payment processing and comprehensive insurance coverage
TrustSafety.israeliSafetyDesc: Understanding Israel's unique security landscape and our specialized safety protocols
TrustSafety.israeliSecurityDesc: Israel is renowned for its world-class security infrastructure and safety measures

securityFeatures.airport: Advanced airport security with state-of-the-art screening technology
securityFeatures.transportation: Secure public transportation with regular security patrols
securityFeatures.emergency: Rapid emergency response systems with multilingual support
securityFeatures.medical: World-class medical facilities with 24/7 emergency services

TrustSafety.postWarSafetyDesc: Specialized safety measures and protocols for the current post-war environment

postWarFeatures.areas: Carefully selected safe areas with real-time security assessments
postWarFeatures.guides: Veteran guides with current security clearance and local knowledge
postWarFeatures.communication: Direct communication with security authorities and emergency services
postWarFeatures.support: Comprehensive support for families and individuals affected by recent events

TrustSafety.emergencyContactsDesc: Important emergency numbers to keep handy during your stay in Israel
TrustSafety.trustStandardsDesc: Transparent, reliable, and secure - the foundation of every LionSTour experience
TrustSafety.verifiedGuidesDesc: All guides undergo comprehensive background checks and security clearance
TrustSafety.transparentPricingDesc: No hidden fees, clear pricing, and flexible cancellation policies
TrustSafety.dataProtectionDesc: Your privacy is protected with industry-leading data security measures
TrustSafety.qualityAssuranceDesc: Continuous monitoring and feedback to ensure the highest quality experiences
TrustSafety.readyToExploreDesc: Join thousands of travelers who have discovered Israel safely with LionSTour

TrustFAQ.title: Trust & Safety FAQ
TrustFAQ.subtitle: Clear answers about safety, verification, and support.

q1.a: All guides complete ID verification, background checks, and peer endorsements before publishing.

q2.q: Is it safe to travel now?
q2.a: We monitor official advisories and provide region-level guidance. Tours adjust in real-time to ensure safety.

q3.a: Operators maintain coverage; guests may add personal travel insurance. Details are provided at checkout.

q4.a: We label routes for mobility, visual, and hearing needs. Message us for tailored recommendations.

q5.a: Flexible: free changes up to 48h; refunds per policy shown at booking time.

Guide.name: Guide Name
Guide.title: Guide Title
Guide.specialtiesDesc: Areas of expertise and unique experiences I offer
Guide.achievementsDesc: Recognition and accomplishments in tourism and community service
Guide.languagesDesc: Languages I speak to ensure clear communication
Guide.readyToExploreDesc: Let's create an unforgettable journey through Israel's most beautiful and meaningful places
Guide.storyContent: As a former IDF officer and nature enthusiast, David brings a unique perspective to Israeli tourism. Having served in the Galilee region for over a decade, he knows every hidden trail, ancient ruin, and local story. His passion for connecting people with Israel's natural beauty and rich history makes every tour an unforgettable journey.

2010.title: Military Service
2010.description: Served as an officer in the IDF, gaining leadership skills and a deep understanding of the land.

2015.title: Certified Guide
2015.description: Completed the rigorous Israeli tour guide certification program.

2020.title: Founded LionSTour
2020.description: Started LionSTour to share authentic, story-driven experiences of Israel.

2024.title: Post-War Tourism
2024.description: Adapting to the new reality, focusing on resilience, hope, and community.

1.quote: David's tour was the highlight of our trip. His stories and knowledge are unparalleled.
1.author: Sarah & Tom, USA

2.quote: An unforgettable experience. David showed us a side of Israel we never would have seen otherwise.
2.author: Maria, Spain

3.quote: Highly recommended. David is a true professional and a wonderful storyteller.
3.author: John, UK

Guide.communityConnectionContent: David is deeply involved in his local community, working with other veterans and community leaders to build a better future. A portion of every tour fee goes to support local initiatives.
